alert.note: Alert for Delta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 22 at 9:58AM EDT until further notice by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction affecting Delta County. .Light rainfall and snow melt continue high river flows. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Elevated river levels caused by rain and snowmelt continue. * WHERE...Sturgeon River near Nahma Junction. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Water overflows the banks along the river * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 8.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/marquette. The next statement will be issued by Sunday afternoon at 200 PM EDT.
